definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Pic. o2 Jacqueline Urbina: An ener with nature during a walk on Exuma Island, Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 在巴哈马埃克苏马岛与大自然亲密接触。

sentences.english: He looked disgustingly healthy when he got back from the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 他从巴哈马群岛回来时看上去健康得令人眼红。

sentences.english: Bahamians chics are among the finest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈马美女是世界最优秀的其中一个。

sentences.english: He'd narrowly escaped being thrown into a Bahamian jail.
sentences.chinese: 他侥幸躲过了被扔进巴哈马监狱。

sentences.english: The storm also caused several deaths in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这个风暴还在巴哈马造成数人死亡。

sentences.english: Lightning arcs from the top of a cloud to the horizon off the coast of the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 来自云端的闪电弧击中巴哈马海岸外的地平线。

sentences.english: Butt then they found out the conference was in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 不过后来她们发现开会地点是巴哈马群岛。

sentences.english: A Bahama Mama is a cocktail of four different kinds of rum.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈马是一个妈妈的四个不同类型的酒鸡尾酒。

sentences.english: The United States case was dismissed in September because the Bahamian government refused to recognize it.
sentences.chinese: 由于巴哈马政府拒绝承认，在美国的破产案被驳回。

sentences.english: Grand Bahama Island is a unique destination.
sentences.chinese: 大巴哈马是世界上独一无二的地方。

sentences.english: A satellite image of the sands and seaweed in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 一幅关于巴哈马沙砾和水草的卫星图像。

sentences.english: I thank you, Your Excellency, and I thank the Government of the Commonwealth of The Bahamas for accepting my credentials as Ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 感谢总督阁下和巴哈马国政府接受我的国书。

sentences.english: An oceanic whitetip shark and diver swim in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈马海域，一只远洋白鳍鲨和潜水员在游泳。

sentences.english: A flock of black-necked stilts glides over the waters surrounding Long Island in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 一群灰颈长脚鹬掠过环绕巴哈马的长岛水域。

sentences.english: Costa Rica, Belize, Nicaragua, Bermuda, the Bahamas, Tobago, Sam Guan.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加伯里兹尼加拉瓜百慕大巴哈马多巴哥？

sentences.english: You can bring the Caribbean into your party with a Bahama Mama punch.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使你的妈妈与巴哈马加勒比冲床党。

definition: Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean

definition: Puerto Rico, self-governing unincorporated territory of the United States
